column7: Hmph. This is a pretty good offering, but I don't take things for free. Here, we're even now.
A warrior can't accept something like this without payback. Here's something for you too, soldier.
I'll bring pain and suffering to everyone!
Blood and death, together hand in hand!
Hello, fellow bringer of death and so on.
How is hell treating you today?
How's your war against the dead going?
A token of my support in your battles.
Piss poor judgement on your part.
Who do you think I am?
A terrible mistake. You won't make it again.
Not going to waste my breath on you.
You're wise to side with me.
You don't have war without a few 'tragic' losses, here and there.
Only an utter fool would side against me in a war.
